SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class SignatureModel

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.SignatureModel
public class SignatureModel extends Object
This class is part of the Model component specific to digital signature operations providing methods to sign data and verify signatures. It encapsulates the data and the logic required to keep track of a user initiated digital signature scheme.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SignatureModel()
    Constructs a new SignatureModel without requiring an initial key representative of the fact that at program launch, the model does not have any state: until it is initiated by the user

  • Constructor Details

    • SignatureModel

      public SignatureModel()
      Constructs a new SignatureModel without requiring an initial key representative of the fact that at program launch, the model does not have any state: until it is initiated by the user

  • Method Details

    • setSignatureType

      public void setSignatureType(SignatureType signatureType)
      Sets the type of signature to be used.
      Parameters:
      signatureType - The type of signature to be set.

    • getSignatureType

      public SignatureType getSignatureType()
      Returns the current type of signature set in the model.
      Returns:
      The current type of signature.

    • setKey

      public void setKey(Key key)
      Sets the key to be used in the signature scheme.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to be set for the signature operations.

    • getKey

      public Key getKey()
      Returns the key for corresponding to current signature scheme.
      Returns:
      The Key respective to the currently set signature scheme.

    • getSigType

      public SignatureType getSigType()
      Returns the type of the current signature scheme.
      Returns:
      The current signature scheme type

    • instantiateSignatureScheme

      public void instantiateSignatureScheme() throws InvalidSignatureTypeException
      Instantiates a signature scheme based on the current key and signature type. Throws an exception if either the key or the signature type is not set.
      Throws:
      InvalidSignatureTypeException - if the parameter passed SignatureType is not valid or supported.

    • sign

      public byte[] sign(byte[] data) throws DataFormatException
      Signs the given data using the current signature scheme.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to be signed.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the digital signature.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the key or signature type is not set before signing.
      DataFormatException - If signing process fails due to incorrect format.

    • verify

      public boolean verify(byte[] data, byte[] signature) throws DataFormatException
      Verifies a signature against the provided data using the current signature scheme.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to be verified against the signature.
      signature - The signature to be verified.
      Returns:
      true if the signature is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the key or signature type is not set before verification.
      DataFormatException - If verification fails due to incorrect format.

    • getNonRecoverableM

      public byte[] getNonRecoverableM()
      Gets the non-recoverable portion of message as generated by the adjusted sign method for signature schemes with message recovery
      Returns:
      signing process initialised non-recoverable portion of message

    • getRecoverableM

      public byte[] getRecoverableM()
      Gets recoverable portion of message as generated by the adjusted verify method for signature schemes with message recovery
      Returns:
      verification process initialised non-recoverable portion of message
